\n <b>Streams</b> are like chat r: Streams are like chat rooms or mailing lists. You can easily join, leave, and make them.

\n <p class=\"api-key-note\">For: For most bots using the API, you'll want to give each bot its own name and API key using the above section. But if you want to write a bot that can access your own private messages, you should use your personal API key.
